00015 C_Solver::C_Solver(KernelFunction* pKernel,
00016                                    const Array<double>& data,
00017                                    const Array<double>& diagModification,
00018                                    const Array<double>& linearPart,
00019                                    const Array<double>& equalityNormal,
00020                                    const Array<double>& inequalityUpper,
00021                                    Array<double>& solutionVector,
00022                                    double& solutionOffset,
00023                                    bool verbose,
00024                                    int cacheMB,
00025                                    double eps,
00026                                    const char* strategy,
00027                                    bool shrinking,
00028                                    bool norm2)
00029 {
00030         examples = data.dim(0);
00031         dimension = data.dim(1);
00032 
00033         kernel = pKernel;
00034         diagMod = diagModification;
00035         linear = linearPart;
00036 
00037         eqNormal = equalityNormal;
00038         box = inequalityUpper;
00039 
00040         alpha = solutionVector;
00041 
00042         printInfo = verbose;
00043         epsilon = eps;
00044         WSS_Strategy = strategy;
00045 
00046         norm2penalty = norm2;
00047 
00048         unsigned int a, i, j;
00049         float* qi;
00050         float* qj;
00051 
00052         double lowerBound = -1e100;
00053         double upperBound = 1e100;
00054         double sum = 0.0;
00055         int freeVars = 0;
00056         double value;
00057 
00058         // prepare the cache
00059         cacheMaxSize = 1048576 * cacheMB / sizeof(float);
00060         cacheSize = 0;
00061         if (cacheMaxSize < 2 * examples) throw "[C_Solver::C_Solver] invalid cache size";
00062         cacheTemp = (float*)malloc(examples * sizeof(float));
00063         if (cacheTemp == NULL) throw "[C_Solver::C_Solver] out of memory error";
00064         cacheNewest = -1;
00065         cacheOldest = -1;
00066         cacheEntry.resize(examples);
00067         for (i=0; i<examples; i++)
00068         {
00069                 cacheEntry[i].data = NULL;
00070                 cacheEntry[i].length = 0;
00071                 cacheEntry[i].older = -2;
00072                 cacheEntry[i].newer = -2;
00073         }
00074 
00075         // prepare the solver internal variables
00076         active = examples;
00077         x.resize(examples, false);
00078         diagonal.resize(examples, false);
00079         permutation.resize(examples, false);
00080         gradient.resize(examples, false);
00081         for (i=0; i<examples; i++)
00082         {
00083                 if (box(i) <= 0.0) throw "[C_Solver::C_Solver] The feasible region is empty.";
00084                 x(i) = data[i].elemvec();
00085                 if (norm2)
00086                         diagonal(i) = diagMod(i) * diagMod(i) * (kernel->eval(x(i), x(i), dimension) + 1.0 / box(i));
00087                 else
00088                         diagonal(i) = diagMod(i) * diagMod(i) * kernel->eval(x(i), x(i), dimension);
00089                 permutation(i) = i;
00090         }
00091         for (i=0; i<examples; i++)
00092         {
00093                 value = linear(i);
00094                 if (alpha(i) != 0.0)
00095                 {
00096                         qi = Q_row(i, 0, examples);
00097                         for (a=0; a<examples; a++) value -= qi[a] * alpha(a);
00098                 }
00099                 gradient(i) = value;
00100         }
00101 
00102         bFirst = true;
00103         bUnshrinked = false;
00104 
00105         unsigned int shrinkCounter = (active < 1000) ? active : 1000;
00106 
00107         SelectWSS();
00108 
00109         // decomposition loop
00110         if (printInfo) cout << "{" << flush;
00111         iter = 0;
00112         while (true)
00113         {
00114                 // select a working set and check for optimality
00115                 if (SelectWorkingSet(i, j))
00116                 {
00117                         if (printInfo) cout << "+" << flush;
00118                         // the solution may be optimal - check again
00119                         if (SelectWorkingSet(i, j))
00120                         {
00121                                 // seems to be optimal
00122                                 if (printInfo) cout << "*" << flush;
00123 
00124                                 if (! shrinking) break;
00125 
00126                                 // do costly unshrinking
00127                                 Unshrink();
00128                                 shrinkCounter = 1;
00129 
00130                                 // check again on the whole problem
00131                                 if (SelectWorkingSet(i, j)) break;
00132                         }
00133                 }
00134 
00135                 double ee = eqNormal(i) * eqNormal(j);
00136                 double ai = alpha(i);
00137                 double aj = alpha(j);
00138                 double Ci = box(i);
00139                 double Cj = box(j);
00140 
00141                 // get the rows of Q corresponding to the working set
00142                 qi = Q_row(i, 0, active);
00143                 qj = Q_row(j, 0, active);
00144 
00145                 // update alpha, that is, solve the sub-problem defined by i and j
00146                 double nominator = gradient(i) - ee * gradient(j);
00147                 double denominator = diagonal(i) + diagonal(j) - 2.0 * ee * qi[j];
00148                 double mu = nominator / denominator;
00149                 if (mu < -ai) mu = -ai;
00150                 else if (! norm2penalty && mu > Ci - ai) mu = Ci - ai;
00151                 if (ee * mu > aj) mu = ee * aj;
00152                 else if (! norm2penalty && ee * mu < aj - Cj) mu = ee * (aj - Cj);
00153                 alpha(i) += mu;
00154                 alpha(j) -= ee * mu;
00155 
00156                 // update the gradient
00157                 for (a=0; a<active; a++) gradient(a) -= mu * (qi[a] - ee * qj[a]);
00158 
00159                 shrinkCounter--;
00160                 if (shrinkCounter == 0)
00161                 {
00162                         // shrink the problem
00163                         if (shrinking) Shrink();
00164 
00165                         shrinkCounter = (active < 1000) ? active : 1000;
00166                         // shrinkCounter = active;
00167                 }
00168 
00169                 iter++;
00170                 if (printInfo)
00171                 {
00172                         if ((iter & 1023) == 0) cout << "." << flush;
00173                 }
00174         }
00175         if (printInfo) cout << endl << "} #iterations=" << iter << endl;
00176 
00177         Unshrink();
00178 
00179         // compute the offset b
00180         for (a=0; a<active; a++)
00181         {
00182                 value = eqNormal(a) * gradient(a);
00183 
00184                 if (eqNormal(a) > 0.0)
00185                 {
00186                         if (alpha(a) == 0.0)
00187                         {
00188                                 if (value < upperBound) upperBound = value;
00189                         }
00190                         else if (! norm2penalty && alpha(a) == box(a))
00191                         {
00192                                 if (value > lowerBound) lowerBound = value;
00193                         }
00194                         else
00195                         {
00196                                 sum += value;
00197                                 freeVars++;
00198                         }
00199                 }
00200                 else
00201                 {
00202                         if (alpha(a) == 0.0)
00203                         {
00204                                 if (value > lowerBound) lowerBound = value;
00205                         }
00206                         else if (! norm2penalty && alpha(a) == box(a))
00207                         {
00208                                 if (value < upperBound) upperBound = value;
00209                         }
00210                         else
00211                         {
00212                                 sum += value;
00213                                 freeVars++;
00214                         }
00215                 }
00216 
00217                 if (freeVars > 0)
00218                         solutionOffset = sum / freeVars;                                                // stabilized exact value
00219                 else
00220                         solutionOffset = 0.5 * (upperBound + lowerBound);               // best estimate
00221         }
00222 
00223         // return alpha
00224         for (i=0; i<examples; i++)
00225         {
00226                 solutionVector(permutation(i)) = alpha(i);
00227         }
00228 }

00233         free(cacheTemp);

00237 double C_Solver::getObjectiveValue()
00238 {
00239         unsigned int i;
00240         double objective;
00241 
00242         // Compute the dual objective value
00243         Unshrink(true);
00244         objective = 0.0;
00245         for (i=0; i<examples; i++)
00246         {
00247                 objective += (1.0 + gradient(i)) * alpha(i);
00248         }
00249         objective *= 0.5;
00250         return objective;
00251 }

00253 bool C_Solver::MVP(unsigned int& i, unsigned int& j)
00254 {
00255         double violation_i = -1e100;
00256         double violation_j = -1e100;
00257         unsigned int a;
00258 
00259         for (a=0; a<active; a++)
00260         {
00261                 if (eqNormal(a) > 0.0)
00262                 {
00263                         if (norm2penalty || alpha(a) < box(a))
00264                         {
00265                                 if (gradient(a) > violation_i)
00266                                 {
00267                                         violation_i = gradient(a);
00268                                         i = a;
00269                                 }
00270                         }
00271                         if (alpha(a) > 0.0)
00272                         {
00273                                 if (-gradient(a) > violation_j)
00274                                 {
00275                                         violation_j = -gradient(a);
00276                                         j = a;
00277                                 }
00278                         }
00279                 }
00280                 else
00281                 {
00282                         if (norm2penalty || alpha(a) < box(a))
00283                         {
00284                                 if (gradient(a) > violation_j)
00285                                 {
00286                                         violation_j = gradient(a);
00287                                         j = a;
00288                                 }
00289                         }
00290                         if (alpha(a) > 0.0)
00291                         {
00292                                 if (-gradient(a) > violation_i)
00293                                 {
00294                                         violation_i = -gradient(a);
00295                                         i = a;
00296                                 }
00297                         }
00298                 }
00299         }
00300 
00301         // MVP stopping condition
00302         return (violation_i + violation_j < epsilon);
00303 }

00305 bool C_Solver::HMG(unsigned int& i, unsigned int& j)
00306 {
00307         if (bFirst)
00308         {
00309                 bFirst = false;
00310                 i = 0;
00311                 for (j=1; j<active; j++) if (eqNormal(j) != eqNormal(i)) return false;
00312                 return true;
00313         }
00314 
00315         // check the corner condition
00316         if (norm2penalty)
00317         {
00318                 if ((alpha(old_i) <= 1e-8) && (alpha(old_j) <= 1e-8))
00319                 {
00320                         if (printInfo) cout << "^" << flush;
00321                         return MVP(i, j);
00322                 }
00323         }
00324         else
00325         {
00326                 double C_i = box(old_i);
00327                 double C_j = box(old_j);
00328                 double eps_i = 1e-8 * C_i;
00329                 double eps_j = 1e-8 * C_j;
00330                 if ((alpha(old_i) <= eps_i || alpha(old_i) >= C_i - eps_i)
00331                                 && ((alpha(old_j) <= eps_j || alpha(old_j) >= C_j - eps_j)))
00332                 {
00333                         if (printInfo) cout << "^" << flush;
00334                         return MVP(i, j);
00335                 }
00336         }
00337 
00338         // generic situation: use the MG selection
00339         unsigned int a;
00340         double aa, ab;                                  // alpha values
00341         double da, db;                                  // diagonal entries of Q
00342         double ga, gb;                                  // gradient in coordinates a and b
00343         double gain;
00344         double Ca, Cb;
00345         double denominator;
00346         float* q;
00347         double mu_max, mu_star;
00348 
00349         double best = 0.0;
00350         double mu_best = 0.0;
00351 
00352         // try combinations with b = old_i
00353         q = Q_row(old_i, 0, active);
00354         ab = alpha(old_i);
00355         db = diagonal(old_i);
00356         Cb = box(old_i);
00357         gb = gradient(old_i);
00358         for (a=0; a<active; a++)
00359         {
00360                 if (a == old_i || a == old_j) continue;
00361 
00362                 aa = alpha(a);
00363                 da = diagonal(a);
00364                 Ca = box(a);
00365                 ga = gradient(a);
00366 
00367                 if (eqNormal(a) * eqNormal(old_i) > 0.0)
00368                 {
00369                         denominator = (da + db - 2.0*q[a]);
00370                         mu_max = (ga - gb) / denominator;
00371                         mu_star = mu_max;
00372 
00373                         if (mu_star < -aa) mu_star = -aa;
00374                         else if (! norm2penalty && mu_star > Ca - aa) mu_star = Ca - aa;
00375                         if (mu_star > ab) mu_star = ab;
00376                         else if (! norm2penalty && mu_star < ab - Cb) mu_star = ab - Cb;
00377 
00378                         gain = mu_star * (2.0 * mu_max - mu_star) * denominator;
00379                 }
00380                 else
00381                 {
00382                         denominator = (da + db + 2.0*q[a]);
00383                         mu_max = (ga + gb) / denominator;
00384                         mu_star = mu_max;
00385 
00386                         if (mu_star < -aa) mu_star = -aa;
00387                         else if (! norm2penalty && mu_star > Ca - aa) mu_star = Ca - aa;
00388                         if (mu_star < -ab) mu_star = -ab;
00389                         else if (! norm2penalty && mu_star > Cb - ab) mu_star = Cb - ab;
00390 
00391                         gain = mu_star * (2.0 * mu_max - mu_star) * denominator;
00392                 }
00393 
00394                 // select the largest gain
00395                 if (gain > best)
00396                 {
00397                         best = gain;
00398                         mu_best = mu_star;
00399                         i = a;
00400                         j = old_i;
00401                 }
00402         }
00403 
00404         // try combinations with old_j
00405         q = Q_row(old_j, 0, active);
00406         ab = alpha(old_j);
00407         db = diagonal(old_j);
00408         Cb = box(old_j);
00409         gb = gradient(old_j);
00410         for (a=0; a<active; a++)
00411         {
00412                 if (a == old_i || a == old_j) continue;
00413 
00414                 aa = alpha(a);
00415                 da = diagonal(a);
00416                 Ca = box(a);
00417                 ga = gradient(a);
00418 
00419                 if (eqNormal(a) * eqNormal(old_j) > 0.0)
00420                 {
00421                         denominator = (da + db - 2.0*q[a]);
00422                         mu_max = (ga - gb) / denominator;
00423                         mu_star = mu_max;
00424 
00425                         if (mu_star < -aa) mu_star = -aa;
00426                         else if (! norm2penalty && mu_star > Ca - aa) mu_star = Ca - aa;
00427                         if (mu_star > ab) mu_star = ab;
00428                         else if (! norm2penalty && mu_star < ab - Cb) mu_star = ab - Cb;
00429 
00430                         gain = mu_star * (2.0 * mu_max - mu_star) * denominator;
00431                 }
00432                 else
00433                 {
00434                         denominator = (da + db + 2.0*q[a]);
00435                         mu_max = (ga + gb) / denominator;
00436                         mu_star = mu_max;
00437 
00438                         if (mu_star < -aa) mu_star = -aa;
00439                         else if (! norm2penalty && mu_star > Ca - aa) mu_star = Ca - aa;
00440                         if (mu_star < -ab) mu_star = -ab;
00441                         else if (! norm2penalty && mu_star > Cb - ab) mu_star = Cb - ab;
00442 
00443                         gain = mu_star * (2.0 * mu_max - mu_star) * denominator;
00444                 }
00445 
00446                 // select the largest gain
00447                 if (gain > best)
00448                 {
00449                         best = gain;
00450                         mu_best = mu_star;
00451                         i = a;
00452                         j = old_j;
00453                 }
00454         }
00455 
00456         // stopping condition
00457         return (fabs(mu_best) < epsilon);
00458 }
00459 
00460 bool C_Solver::Libsvm28(unsigned int& i, unsigned int& j)
00461 {
00462         i=0;
00463         j=1;
00464 
00465         double violation_i = -1e100;
00466         double violation_j = -1e100;
00467         unsigned int a;
00468 
00469         // find the first index of the MVP
00470         for (a=0; a<active; a++)
00471         {
00472                 if (eqNormal(a) > 0.0)
00473                 {
00474                         if (norm2penalty || alpha(a) < box(a))
00475                         {
00476                                 if (gradient(a) > violation_i)
00477                                 {
00478                                         violation_i = gradient(a);
00479                                         i = a;
00480                                 }
00481                         }
00482                 }
00483                 else
00484                 {
00485                         if (alpha(a) > 0.0)
00486                         {
00487                                 if (-gradient(a) > violation_i)
00488                                 {
00489                                         violation_i = -gradient(a);
00490                                         i = a;
00491                                 }
00492                         }
00493                 }
00494         }
00495 
00496         // find the second index using second order information
00497         float* q = Q_row(i, 0, active);
00498         double best = 0.0;
00499         for (a=0; a<active; a++)
00500         {
00501                 if (eqNormal(a) > 0.0)
00502                 {
00503                         if (alpha(a) > 0.0)
00504                         {
00505                                 if (-gradient(a) > violation_j) violation_j = -gradient(a);
00506 
00507                                 double grad_diff = violation_i - gradient(a);
00508                                 if (grad_diff > 0)
00509                                 {
00510                                         double quad_coef = diagonal(i) + diagonal(a) - 2.0 * eqNormal(i) * q[a];
00511                                         double obj_diff = (grad_diff * grad_diff) / quad_coef;
00512 
00513                                         if (obj_diff > best)
00514                                         {
00515                                                 best = obj_diff;
00516                                                 j = a;
00517                                         }
00518                                 }
00519                         }
00520                 }
00521                 else
00522                 {
00523                         if (norm2penalty || alpha(a) < box(a))
00524                         {
00525                                 if (gradient(a) > violation_j) violation_j = gradient(a);
00526 
00527                                 double grad_diff = violation_i + gradient(a);
00528                                 if (grad_diff > 0)
00529                                 {
00530                                         double quad_coef = diagonal(i) + diagonal(a) + 2.0 * eqNormal(i) * q[a];
00531                                         double obj_diff = (grad_diff * grad_diff) / quad_coef;
00532 
00533                                         if (obj_diff > best)
00534                                         {
00535                                                 best = obj_diff;
00536                                                 j = a;
00537                                         }
00538                                 }
00539                         }
00540                 }
00541         }
00542 
00543         // MVP stopping condition
00544         return (violation_i + violation_j < epsilon);
00545 }
00546 
00547 bool C_Solver::SelectWorkingSet(unsigned int& i, unsigned int& j)
00548 {
00549         // dynamic working set selection call
00550         bool ret = (this->*(this->currentWSS))(i, j);
00551 
00552         // bool ret = Libsvm28(i, j);
00553         // bool ret = HMG(i, j);
00554         old_i = i;
00555         old_j = j;
00556         return ret;
00557 }
00558 
00559 void C_Solver::SelectWSS()
00560 {
00561         if (strcmp(WSS_Strategy, "MVP") == 0)
00562         {
00563                 // most violating pair, used e.g. in LIBSVM 2.71
00564                 currentWSS = &C_Solver::MVP;
00565         }
00566         else if (strcmp(WSS_Strategy, "HMG") == 0)
00567         {
00568                 // hybrid maximum gain, suitable for large problems
00569                 currentWSS = &C_Solver::HMG;
00570         }
00571         else if (strcmp(WSS_Strategy, "LIBSVM28") == 0)
00572         {
00573                 // LIBSVM 2.8 second order algorithm
00574                 currentWSS = &C_Solver::Libsvm28;
00575         }
00576         else
00577         {
00578                 // default strategy:
00579                 // use HMG as long as the problem does not fit into the cache,
00580                 // use the LIBSVM 2.8 algorithm afterwards
00581                 if (active * active > cacheMaxSize)
00582                         currentWSS = &C_Solver::HMG;
00583                 else
00584                         currentWSS = &C_Solver::Libsvm28;
00585         }
00586 }
00587 
00588 void C_Solver::Shrink()
00589 {
00590         std::vector<unsigned int> shrinked;
00591         unsigned int a;
00592 
00593         double g1 = 1e100;
00594         double g2 = 1e100;
00595         double v, g;
00596 
00597         // find largest KKT violations
00598         for (a=0; a<active; a++)
00599         {
00600                 g = gradient(a);
00601                 v = alpha(a);
00602                 if (eqNormal(a) > 0.0)
00603                 {
00604                         if (v > 0.0 && g < g1) g1 = g;
00605                         if ((norm2penalty || v < box(a)) && -g < g2) g2 = -g;
00606                 }
00607                 else
00608                 {
00609                         if (v > 0.0 && g < g2) g2 = g;
00610                         if ((norm2penalty || v < box(a)) && -g < g1) g1 = -g;
00611                 }
00612         }
00613 
00614         if (! bUnshrinked && -g1 - g2 < 10.0 * epsilon)
00615         {
00616                 // unshrink the problem at this accuracy level
00617                 if (printInfo) cout << "#" << flush;
00618                 Unshrink();
00619                 bUnshrinked = true;
00620                 SelectWSS();
00621                 return;
00622         }
00623 
00624         // identify the variables to shrink
00625         for (a=0; a<active; a++)
00626         {
00627                 if (a == old_i) continue;
00628                 if (a == old_j) continue;
00629                 g = gradient(a);
00630                 v = alpha(a);
00631                 if (eqNormal(a) > 0.0)
00632                 {
00633                         if (v == 0.0)
00634                         {
00635                                 if (g > g1) continue;
00636                         }
00637                         else if (! norm2penalty && v == box(a))
00638                         {
00639                                 if (g < -g2) continue;
00640                         }
00641                         else continue;
00642                 }
00643                 else
00644                 {
00645                         if (v == 0.0)
00646                         {
00647                                 if (g > g2) continue;
00648                         }
00649                         else if (! norm2penalty && v == box(a))
00650                         {
00651                                 if (g < -g1) continue;
00652                         }
00653                         else continue;
00654                 }
00655 
00656                 // In this moment no feasible step including this variable
00657                 // can improve the objective. Thus deactivate the variable.
00658                 shrinked.push_back(a);
00659                 if (cacheEntry[a].length > 0) cacheDelete(a);
00660         }
00661 
00662         int s, sc = shrinked.size();
00663         if (sc == 0)
00664         {
00665                 return;
00666         }
00667         unsigned int new_active = active - sc;
00668 
00669         // exchange variables such that shrinked variables
00670         // are moved to the ends of the lists.
00671         unsigned int k, high = active;
00672         for (s=sc-1; s>=0; s--)
00673         {
00674                 k = shrinked[s];
00675                 high--;
00676 
00677                 // exchange the variables "k" and "high"
00678                 Exchange(k, high);
00679         }
00680 
00681         // shrink the cache entries
00682         for (a=0; a<examples; a++)
00683         {
00684                 if (cacheEntry[a].length > (int)new_active) cacheResize(a, new_active);
00685         }
00686 
00687         active = new_active;
00688 
00689         SelectWSS();
00690 }
00691 
00692 void C_Solver::Unshrink(bool complete)
00693 {
00694         if (printInfo) cout << "[" << flush;
00695         if (active == examples)
00696         {
00697                 if (printInfo) cout << "]" << flush;
00698                 return;
00699         }
00700 
00701         unsigned int i, a;
00702         float* q;
00703         double v, g;
00704         double g1 = 1e100;
00705         double g2 = 1e100;
00706 
00707         // compute the inactive gradient components (quadratic time complexity)
00708         unsigned int ac = active;
00709         active = examples;
00710         for (a=ac; a<examples; a++) gradient(a) = 1.0;
00711         for (i=0; i<examples; i++)
00712         {
00713                 v = alpha(i);
00714                 if (v == 0.0) continue;
00715 
00716                 q = Q_row(i, ac, examples, true);
00717                 for (a=ac; a<examples; a++) gradient(a) -= q[a] * v;
00718         }
00719 
00720         if (complete)
00721         {
00722                 active = examples;
00723                 return;
00724         }
00725 
00726         // find largest KKT violations
00727         for (a=0; a<active; a++)
00728         {
00729                 g = gradient(a);
00730                 v = alpha(a);
00731                 if (eqNormal(a) > 0.0)
00732                 {
00733                         if (v > 0.0 && g < g1) g1 = g;
00734                         if ((norm2penalty || v < box(a)) && -g < g2) g2 = -g;
00735                 }
00736                 else
00737                 {
00738                         if (v > 0.0 && g < g2) g2 = g;
00739                         if ((norm2penalty || v < box(a)) && -g < g1) g1 = -g;
00740                 }
00741         }
00742 
00743         // identify the variables to activate
00744         for (a=active; a<examples; a++)
00745         {
00746                 if (a == old_i) continue;
00747                 if (a == old_j) continue;
00748                 g = gradient(a);
00749                 v = alpha(a);
00750                 if (eqNormal(a) > 0.0)
00751                 {
00752                         if (v == 0.0)
00753                         {
00754                                 if (g <= g1) continue;
00755                         }
00756                         else if (! norm2penalty && v == box(a))
00757                         {
00758                                 if (g >= -g2) continue;
00759                         }
00760                 }
00761                 else
00762                 {
00763                         if (v == 0.0)
00764                         {
00765                                 if (g <= g2) continue;
00766                         }
00767                         else if (! norm2penalty && v == box(a))
00768                         {
00769                                 if (g >= -g1) continue;
00770                         }
00771                 }
00772                 Exchange(active, a);
00773                 active++;
00774         }
00775 
00776         if (printInfo) cout << active << "]" << flush;
00777 }
00778 
00779 #define XCHG_A(t, a, i, j) {t temp; temp = a(i); a(i) = a(j); a(j) = temp;}
00780 #define XCHG_V(t, a, i, j) {t temp; temp = a[i]; a[i] = a[j]; a[j] = temp;}
00781 // (i <= j) is required!
00782 void C_Solver::Exchange(unsigned int i, unsigned int j)
00783 {
00784         if (i == j) return;
00785 
00786         int t;
00787 
00788         // check the previous working set
00789         if (old_i == i) old_i = j;
00790         else if (old_i == j) old_i = i;
00791 
00792         if (old_j == i) old_j = j;
00793         else if (old_j == j) old_j = i;
00794 
00795         // exchange entries in the simple lists
00796         XCHG_A(const double*, x, i, j);
00797         XCHG_A(double, diagMod, i, j);
00798         XCHG_A(double, eqNormal, i, j);
00799         XCHG_A(double, box, i, j);
00800         XCHG_A(double, linear, i, j);
00801         XCHG_A(double, alpha, i, j);
00802         XCHG_A(unsigned int, permutation, i, j);
00803         XCHG_A(double, diagonal, i, j);
00804         XCHG_A(double, gradient, i, j);
00805 
00806         // update the ordered cache list predecessors and successors
00807         t = cacheEntry[i].older;
00808         if (t != -2)
00809         {
00810                 if (t == -1) cacheOldest = j;
00811                 else cacheEntry[t].newer = j;
00812                 t = cacheEntry[i].newer;
00813                 if (t == -1) cacheNewest = j;
00814                 else cacheEntry[t].older = j;
00815         }
00816         t = cacheEntry[j].older;
00817         if (cacheEntry[j].older != -2)
00818         {
00819                 if (t == -1) cacheOldest = i;
00820                 else cacheEntry[t].newer = i;
00821                 t = cacheEntry[j].newer;
00822                 if (t == -1) cacheNewest = i;
00823                 else cacheEntry[t].older = i;
00824         }
00825 
00826         // exchange the cache entries
00827         XCHG_V(tCacheEntry, cacheEntry, i, j);
00828 
00829         // exchange all cache row entries
00830         unsigned int k, l;
00831         for (k=0; k<examples; k++)
00832         {
00833                 l = cacheEntry[k].length;
00834                 if (j < l)
00835                 {
00836                         XCHG_V(float, cacheEntry[k].data, i, j);
00837                 }
00838                 else if (i < l)
00839                 {
00840                         // only one element is available from the cache
00841                         if (norm2penalty && i == k)
00842                                 cacheEntry[k].data[k] = diagMod(k) * diagMod(k) * (kernel->eval(x(k), x(k), dimension) + 1.0 / box(k));
00843                         else
00844                                 cacheEntry[k].data[i] = diagMod(i) * diagMod(k) * kernel->eval(x(i), x(k), dimension);
00845                 }
00846         }
00847 }
00848 
00849 void C_Solver::cacheAppend(int var)
00850 {
00851         if (cacheNewest == -1)
00852         {
00853                 cacheNewest = var;
00854                 cacheOldest = var;
00855                 cacheEntry[var].older = -1;
00856                 cacheEntry[var].newer = -1;
00857         }
00858         else
00859         {
00860                 cacheEntry[cacheNewest].newer = var;
00861                 cacheEntry[var].older = cacheNewest;
00862                 cacheEntry[var].newer = -1;
00863                 cacheNewest = var;
00864         }
00865 }
00866 
00867 void C_Solver::cacheRemove(int var)
00868 {
00869         if (cacheEntry[var].older == -1)
00870                 cacheOldest = cacheEntry[var].newer;
00871         else
00872                 cacheEntry[cacheEntry[var].older].newer = cacheEntry[var].newer;
00873 
00874         if (cacheEntry[var].newer == -1)
00875                 cacheNewest = cacheEntry[var].older;
00876         else
00877                 cacheEntry[cacheEntry[var].newer].older = cacheEntry[var].older;
00878 
00879         cacheEntry[var].older = -2;
00880         cacheEntry[var].newer = -2;
00881 }
00882 
00883 void C_Solver::cacheAdd(int var, unsigned int length)
00884 {
00885         cacheEntry[var].length = length;
00886         cacheEntry[var].data = (float*)(void*)malloc(length * sizeof(float));
00887         if (cacheEntry[var].data == NULL) throw "[C_Solver::cacheAppend] out of memory error";
00888         cacheSize += length;
00889 
00890         cacheAppend(var);
00891 }
00892 
00893 void C_Solver::cacheDelete(int var)
00894 {
00895         free(cacheEntry[var].data);
00896         cacheSize -= cacheEntry[var].length;
00897 
00898         cacheEntry[var].data = NULL;
00899         cacheEntry[var].length = 0;
00900 
00901         cacheRemove(var);
00902 }
00903 
00904 void C_Solver::cacheResize(int var, unsigned int newlength)
00905 {
00906         int diff = newlength - cacheEntry[var].length;
00907         if (diff == 0) return;
00908         cacheSize += diff;
00909         cacheEntry[var].length = newlength;
00910         cacheEntry[var].data = (float*)(void*)realloc((void*)cacheEntry[var].data, newlength * sizeof(float));
00911         if (cacheEntry[var].data == NULL) throw "[C_Solver::cacheResize] out of memory error";
00912 }
00913 
00914 void C_Solver::cacheClear()
00915 {
00916         unsigned int e, ec = cacheEntry.size();
00917         for (e=0; e<ec; e++)
00918         {
00919                 if (cacheEntry[e].data != NULL) free(cacheEntry[e].data);
00920                 cacheEntry[e].data = NULL;
00921                 cacheEntry[e].length = 0;
00922                 cacheEntry[e].older = -1;
00923                 cacheEntry[e].newer = -1;
00924         }
00925         cacheOldest = -1;
00926         cacheNewest = -1;
00927         cacheSize = 0;
00928 }
00929 
00930 float* C_Solver::Q_row(unsigned int k, int begin, int end, bool temp)
00931 {
00932         if (temp)
00933         {
00934                 // return temporary data
00935                 if (cacheEntry[k].length > begin)
00936                 {
00937                         memcpy(cacheTemp + begin, cacheEntry[k].data + begin, cacheEntry[k].length - begin);
00938                         begin = cacheEntry[k].length;
00939                 }
00940                 const double* x_k = x(k);
00941                 double d_k = diagMod(k);
00942                 int a;
00943                 for (a=begin; a<end; a++) cacheTemp[a] = d_k * diagMod(a) * kernel->eval(x_k, x(a), dimension);
00944                 if (norm2penalty && (int)k >= begin && (int)k < end)
00945                         cacheTemp[k] = d_k * d_k * (kernel->eval(x_k, x_k, dimension) + 1.0 / box(k));
00946                 return cacheTemp;
00947         }
00948         else
00949         {
00950                 // the data will be stored in the cache
00951                 int l = cacheEntry[k].length;
00952                 while (cacheSize + end - l > cacheMaxSize)
00953                 {
00954                         if (cacheOldest == (int)k)
00955                         {
00956                                 cacheRemove(k);
00957                                 cacheAppend(k);
00958                         }
00959                         cacheDelete(cacheOldest);
00960                 }
00961                 if (l == 0)
00962                 {
00963                         cacheAdd(k, end);
00964                 }
00965                 else
00966                 {
00967                         cacheResize(k, end);
00968                         if ((int)k != cacheNewest)
00969                         {
00970                                 cacheRemove(k);
00971                                 cacheAppend(k);
00972                         }
00973                 }
00974 
00975                 // compute remaining entries
00976                 if (l < end)
00977                 {
00978                         const double* x_k = x(k);
00979                         double d_k = diagMod(k);
00980                         int a;
00981                         float* p = cacheEntry[k].data + l;
00982                         for (a=l; a<end; a++)
00983                         {
00984                                 *p = d_k * diagMod(a) * kernel->eval(x_k, x(a), dimension);
00985                                 p++;
00986                         }
00987                         if (norm2penalty && (int)k >= l && (int)k < end)
00988                                 cacheEntry[k].data[k] = d_k * d_k * (kernel->eval(x_k, x_k, dimension) + 1.0 / box(k));
00989                 }
00990 
00991                 return cacheEntry[k].data;
00992         }
00993 }
